      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(int x,
                   int y)
        moveTo is the basic movement method which all other movement methods should call. Handles drawing of the turtle path, keeping the turtle inside the world and world redrawing.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate the turtle will go to.
        y - Y-coordinate the turtle will go to.
